p: All experiments were performed at least three times. Data were statistically analyzed by unpaired t-tests and a one-way ANOVA in Prism 7.0 software (GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA, United States). Differences were considered significant if there was an unadjusted P-value less than 0.05. The instantaneous velocity and direction were analyzed by Imaris Ã— 64 9.3.1 software (Imaris Software, Oxford Instruments, United Kingdom), and the data were analyzed by Statistical Product and Service Solutions (SPSS) 13.0 software (SPSS Software, IBM, United States).
